languages.text: Призвал{mf||а} гвардейцев из живой десятины быть верными Империуму.
Called on the Guardsmen from the living tithe to be loyal to the Imperium.

languages.text: Has instigado a la lealtad al Imperium a los soldados de la Guardia del diezmo viviente.
languages.original_text: Called on the Guardsmen from the living tithe to be loyal to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Has instigado a la lealtad al Imperium a los soldados de la Guardia del diezmo viviente.

languages.text: 你号召什一税之中的帝国卫队士兵效忠帝国。
languages.original_text: Called on the Guardsmen from the living tithe to be loyal to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 你号召什一税之中的帝国卫队士兵效忠帝国。

languages.text: 生きている租税からのガーズマンに帝国に忠実になるよう呼びかける。
languages.original_text: Called on the Guardsmen from the living tithe to be loyal to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 生きている租税からのガーズマンに帝国に忠実になるよう呼びかける。

languages.text: Vous en avez appelé à la loyauté des gardes de la dîme vivante envers l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: Called on the Guardsmen from the living tithe to be loyal to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Vous en avez appelé à la loyauté des gardes de la dîme vivante envers l'Imperium.

languages.text: Canlı aşara mensup Muhafızları İmparatorluk'a sadık olmaya çağırdın.
languages.original_text: Called on the Guardsmen from the living tithe to be loyal to the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Canlı aşara mensup Muhafızları İmparatorluk'a sadık olmaya çağırdın.

languages.text: Die Gardisten des lebenden Zehnts aufgefordert, dem Imperium die Treue zu schwören.

traits.locale_text: Die Gardisten des lebenden Zehnts aufgefordert, dem Imperium die Treue zu schwören.
